document_data.mainbody:
ragonheir Clans was an Abeiran book that chronicled the story of the Dragonheirs of the Sword Lands, and recorded the genealogy of every Dragonheir clan that had existed.
In 1479 DR, the book came into possession of the adventuress Jada Marlserpent, the last survivor of Clan Marlserpent. Before that, the book was owned by a merchant of Harimmon, Shander Harimdor.
